description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow  changes on the design, in relation to planning permission reference 215581HH dated 10/11/2021 for 'Single storey side/rear (wrap around) extension; construction of detached rear outbuilding (use as garage/office); following the demolition of rear garage; alteration to raised rear terrace'
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number (s): E1000 Revision E2 Location Plan, E1001 Revision E2 Existing Site Plan, E1010 Revision E2 Existing Ground Floor & First Floor Plans, E1020 Revision E2 Existing North & South Elevations, E1021 Revision E2 Existing East & West Elevations, E1030 Revision E2 Existing Section A & East Elevation, P1001 Revision P2 Proposed Site Plan, P1010 Revision P2 Proposed Ground Floor & First Floor Plans, P1020 Revision P2 Proposed North & South Elevations, P1021 Revision P2 Proposed East & West Elevations, P1030 Revision P2 Proposed Section A & East Elevation
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
